overview: In the mid-30s, Kuomintang Sichuan rhubarb Division Commander Liu Shaoji colludes with Japanese invaders. He sends the cloud boat's beauty to the Si-chuan Opera.  The Si-chuan opera entertainer steps forward in sharp opposition with warlord's wicked running dogs.  Mu Xiaolou sacrifices himself up to take the righteous path and confronts the Japanese invaders.

production_companies.name: Hong Kong-China Chang He Film Co.

title: Cross the River
